venue: Art Studio, 123 Creative Avenue, Seattle, WA
steps: Arrive at the venue 10 minutes early for registration.
Meet the instructor and other participants in the studio.
Watch a brief demonstration on different textures and materials.
Start creating art with clay, paints, and textured paper.
Take breaks as needed, explore different textures, and ask questions.
Conclude the session with a group reflection on creations.
safety: Ensure children are not allergic to any materials and use non-toxic substances only.
